website_summaries.verdict: A popular flavor that is liked by almost everyone.
pros: Lightly sweet flavor that even picky kids like
Looks pretty when holding the can with freshly manicured nails

customer_reviews.title: Tumi flavor just fell flat and miss the mark
customer_reviews.text: it wasn't really one of my favorite flavors and sometimes that's always hit and mess with lacroix but just when was a hard mess for me so that's really sad because I'm looking to expand my flavor palette when it comes to sparkling water and this really missed the mark for me it didn't have enough flavor it just had barely anything to make it different from straight seltzer water and that flavor really wasn't good. To me the coconut is hands down their best product.
customer_reviews.author: SuzAnne

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: THE. BEST. LA. CROIX. FLAVOR. EVERRRR. Perfect balance of flavor, carbonation, and crisp refreshing taste. You should check this flavor out if you haven't already. I can't tell you how many of my friends have become Sparkling Water converts after I forced them to try this. "Wow Mark, this tastes incredible!" "Wow Mark, I was gonna lie and tell you I liked it so you'd be happy, but I really really like it!!" Hahah you gotta try it if you haven't. You can thank me later. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love trying new LaCroix!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious flavor... hadn't tried this one before. Will buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best La Croix Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love keeping a cold can of LC in my purse. These have no sugarand taste great. It arrived fully intact to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynite

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: These are SO incredibly tasty, they are too often sold out at my local grocery store. La Croix seems to be a love it or hate it sore of product - but if you are in to it, Passion Fruit and Mango flavors are soooooo flippin' amazing!
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The product is tasty, but it could taste more like passion fruit
customer_reviews.author: Dayane Duarte

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite La Croix flavor. Only complaint--it's so popular, that it's often sold out on Amazon. :D
customer_reviews.author: Lulu P

customer_reviews.title: Bad flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is so gross. We threw them in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Haimowicz

customer_reviews.title: not so berry taste
customer_reviews.text: this was a hard one it did not taste like any berry flavor had kinda off flavor
customer_reviews.author: QJat Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This (and some other flavors of the same product) are fantastic beverages for those who want to drink fewer sodas, but are bored by plain water. The carbonation is noticeable (I like a lot of fizz), and I got a faint whiff of the diluted fruit oils before I even took a sip. Delightful, really. So happy to have discovered this stuff at a friend's house! Now it's on my shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeper Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST La Croix flavor. Refreshing, tart, fantastic in cocktails. Step your game up & branch out to the sophisticated La Croix
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H

customer_reviews.title: Passionfruit forever!
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite flavored la croix!! Absolutely wonderful! ♡♡
customer_reviews.author: D. Waters

customer_reviews.title: THIS TASTE AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: positive reviews for these sparkling water must have been paid for. these are awful! can barely taste the flavor because bitter carbonation is overpowering. wished i took the time to read all the reviews before purchase. wish i can return them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate less than one star, I would. This beverage is probably the worst thing I've ever tasted. I have no idea what all the hype is about. I would never recommend trying this, even if you're absolutely in need of a drink... don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey M.

product_meta.title: LaCroix Sparkling Water, Passion Fruit, 12oz Cans, 12 Pack, Naturally Essenced, 0 Calories, 0 Sweeteners, 0 Sodium
product_meta.description: LaCroix Sparkling Water is a refreshing and healthy beverage that can be enjoyed in any setting. Each sip of LaCroix Sparking Water is flavored with the natural essence oils extracted from the named fruit on the can. It contains 0-calories, 0-sweeteners, and 0-sodium. This means you can enjoy the refreshing taste of a carbonated beverage completely guilt-free. LaCroix sparkling drinks are vegan, gluten-free, and tastes great! Our water is sourced in the U.S.A. and has a lower carbon footprint than imported brands. The average person needs to drink eight 8-oz glasses of water a day, and with LaCroix Sparkling Water, each of those eight glasses can have a special, fruity zest that you will love! Enjoy LaCroix!
feature_bullets: 12-PACK: Passion Fruit 12 oz cans, perfect for the fridge, office, or your next family get-together!
HEALTHIER: Unlike sports drinks, vitamin enhanced waters, and sodas, LaCroix is a healthy for you, natural sparkling water with 0 calories, 0 sweeteners and 0 sodium.

GUILT FREE: Drink with zero worries! LaCroix contains 0 calories, 0 sweeteners, and 0 sodium. Our sparkling water is vegan, gluten free, non-GMO, and Whole30 approved. Our drinks offer the perfect splash of refreshment for work and play.

REFRESHING: LaCroix is a wholesome, refreshing sparkling water that you can feel good about sharing with your friends and family. Enjoy LaCroix at the gym, in the office or on the go! LaCroix is made with purified, triple filtered water that is sourced in the U.S.A.
FUN: LaCroix is the perfect drink for every occasion. LaCroix Mocktail recipes even provide a splash of fun for your next party or get-together. Let LaCroix bring fun to your healthy lifestyle!
